{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine if improvements in outreach, clinical, and family and community-based services predict improvements in child survival, we need to consider the relationship between these factors. Clinical services refer to the medical care provided by healthcare professionals. Family and community-based services involve providing support and resources to families and communities to promote health and well-being.
